Upgrade to Pro version to use this feature Setting Please turn on this setting.This is for navigation(home,back,power menu) and on some Samsung device for expand status bar. Enable accessibility can cause lag in some device when using Chrome. This happen to all apps that use accessibility. If the lag is too extreme please disable this setting, all feature still available except the navigation (home, back, power menu).
